rule.name: AS_IO_UT_constructFundingDetailsForOnboarding
rule.description: Constructs the funding details for onboarding based on status
rule.definition: a!localVariables( local!awaitingFunding: contains( { #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_48763", #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_48769" }, ri!onboardingRequest.status ), local!actualFundingDate: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_ActualFundingDate" ), local!cancelledDate: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_CancellationDate" ), local!estFundingDate: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_EstimatedFundingDate" ), local!label: a!map( 'ONBOARDING_STATUS_COMPLETE': local!actualFundingDate, 'ONBOARDING_STATUS_FUNDED': local!actualFundingDate, 'ONBOARDING_STATUS_CANCELLED': local!cancelledDate ), local!value: a!map( 'ONBOARDING_STATUS_COMPLETE': ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.actualFundingDate, 'ONBOARDING_STATUS_FUNDED': ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.actualFundingDate, 'ONBOARDING_STATUS_CANCELLED': #"_a-0000e2ad-62e7-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_75551"(ri!onboardingRequest.modifiedDatetime) ), local!overdue: and( local!awaitingFunding, ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.estFundingDate < today() ), local!dueToday: and( local!awaitingFunding, ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.estFundingDate = today() ), a!map( label: index( local!label, ri!onboardingRequest.status, local!estFundingDate ), value: index( local!value, ri!onboardingRequest.status, ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.estFundingDate ), color: if( local!overdue, "NEGATIVE", local!dueToday, #"_a-0000e62c-7375-8000-9bec-011c48011c48_1924695"(brandingKey: "WarningColor"), "" ), icon: if( local!overdue, "clock-o", local!dueToday, "exclamation-triangle", local!awaitingFunding, "info-circle", "" ), countDownValue: if( local!overdue, #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_Overdue" ), local!dueToday, #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_DueToday" ), local!awaitingFunding, a!localVariables( local!daysAway: tointeger( abs( ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.estFundingDate - today() ) ), #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: if( local!daysAway = 1, "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_1DayAway", "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_XDaysAway" ), /* Countdown to esimated funding date */ arguments: local!daysAway ) ), ri!onboardingRequest.status = #"_a-0000e471-623a-8000-9bc3-011c48011c48_659949", a!localVariables( local!fundingDateDaysAwayMagnitude: tointeger( abs( today() - ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.actualFundingDate ) ), #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_81818"( i18nData: ri!i18nData, bundleKey: if( ri!onboardingRequest.fundingDetails.actualFundingDate <= today(), if( local!fundingDateDaysAwayMagnitude = 1, "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_1DayAgo", "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_XDaysAgo" ), /* TOBEDONE: Is a future date even possible here? */ if( local!fundingDateDaysAwayMagnitude = 1, "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_1DayAway", "AS.CO.AllBundles.lbl_XDaysAway" ) ), /* Countdown to actual funding date */ arguments: local!fundingDateDaysAwayMagnitude ) ), "" ) ) )

a:expectedOutput.a:value: a!map( label: "Estimated Funding Date", value: today()+5, color: "", icon: "info-circle", countDownValue: "5 days away" )
a!map( label: "Estimated Funding Date", value: today()-5, color: "NEGATIVE", icon: "clock-o", countDownValue: "Overdue" )

a:ruleInputTestConfigs.a:value: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_OnboardingRequest'( status: #"_a-0000e2cd-bc96-8000-9ba2-011c48011c48_49494", modifiedDatetime: now()-5, fundingDetails: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:IO}AS_IO_OnboardingFundingDetails'( estFundingDate: today()-5, estFundingValue: 100 ) )

a:assertions.a:resultAssertions: test!output=a!map( label: "Cancellation Date", value: today()-5, color: "", icon: "", countDownValue: "" )
